title: Art Insights: Georgia O'Keeffe: "Mother of American Modernism"
hero_caption: Georgia O'Keeffe. Blue and Green Music, 1919/21. Alfred Stieglitz Collection, gift of Georgia O'Keeffe.&nbsp;
description:
Art Insights is a free community program that provides an enlightening art-enrichment experience for older members of the community who are unable to visit the Art Institute in person. Join us for a fun discussion led by volunteer lecturer Dick Wright about the life and art of Georgia O'Keeffe.

*This community presentation is hosted by Chicago Methodist Senior Services. Please e-mail edgewatervillagechicago@gmail.com to register or for more information.
